mapper.update:
update SUC_USER
ORG_ID = #{orgId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
LOGIN_NAME = #{loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LOGIN_PSWD = #{loginPswd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PAY_PSWD = #{payPswd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SALT = #{salt,jdbcType=CHAR},
NICKNAME = #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FACE = #{face,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REALNAME = #{realname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_VERIFIED_REALNAME = #{isVerifiedRealname,jdbcType=TINYINT},
IDCARD = #{idcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_VERIFIED_IDCARD = #{isVerifiedIdcard,jdbcType=TINYINT},
EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_VERIFIED_EMAIL = #{isVerifiedEmail,jdbcType=TINYINT},
MOBILE = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_VERIFIED_MOBILE = #{isVerifiedMobile,jdbcType=TINYINT},
QQ_ID = #{qqId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
QQ_OPENID = #{qqOpenid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
QQ_NICKNAME = #{qqNickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
QQ_FACE = #{qqFace,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WX_ID = #{wxId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WX_OPENID = #{wxOpenid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WX_NICKNAME = #{wxNickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WX_FACE = #{wxFace,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_TESTER = #{isTester,jdbcType=TINYINT},
IS_LOCK = #{isLock,jdbcType=TINYINT},
PROMOTER_ID = #{promoterId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
MODIFIED_TIMESTAMP = #{modifiedTimestamp,jdbcType=BIGINT},
DOMAIN_ID = #{domainId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update SUC_USER set ORG_ID = #{orgId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, LOGIN_NAME = #{loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LOGIN_PSWD = #{loginPswd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PAY_PSWD = #{payPswd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SALT = #{salt,jdbcType=CHAR}, NICKNAME = #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FACE = #{face,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REALNAME = #{realname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_VERIFIED_REALNAME = #{isVerifiedRealname,jdbcType=TINYINT}, IDCARD = #{idcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_VERIFIED_IDCARD = #{isVerifiedIdcard,jdbcType=TINYINT}, EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_VERIFIED_EMAIL = #{isVerifiedEmail,jdbcType=TINYINT}, MOBILE = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_VERIFIED_MOBILE = #{isVerifiedMobile,jdbcType=TINYINT}, QQ_ID = #{qqId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, QQ_OPENID = #{qqOpenid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, QQ_NICKNAME = #{qqNickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, QQ_FACE = #{qqFace,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WX_ID = #{wxId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WX_OPENID = #{wxOpenid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WX_NICKNAME = #{wxNickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WX_FACE = #{wxFace,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_TESTER = #{isTester,jdbcType=TINYINT}, IS_LOCK = #{isLock,jdbcType=TINYINT}, PROMOTER_ID = #{promoterId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, MODIFIED_TIMESTAMP = #{modifiedTimestamp,jdbcType=BIGINT}, DOMAIN_ID = #{domainId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select ID, ORG_ID, LOGIN_NAME, LOGIN_PSWD, PAY_PSWD, SALT, NICKNAME, FACE, REALNAME, IS_VERIFIED_REALNAME, IDCARD, IS_VERIFIED_IDCARD, EMAIL, IS_VERIFIED_EMAIL, MOBILE, IS_VERIFIED_MOBILE, QQ_ID, QQ_OPENID, QQ_NICKNAME, QQ_FACE, WX_ID, WX_OPENID, WX_NICKNAME, WX_FACE, IS_TESTER, IS_LOCK, PROMOTER_ID, MODIFIED_TIMESTAMP, DOMAIN_ID from SUC_USER
mapper.sql: ID, LOGIN_NAME, NICKNAME, REALNAME, QQ_NICKNAME, WX_NICKNAME
mapper.select:
select
from SUC_USER
and LOGIN_NAME LIKE '%${users}%' OR NICKNAME LIKE '%${users}%' OR REALNAME LIKE '%${users}%' OR IDCARD LIKE '%${users}%' OR EMAIL LIKE '%${users}%' OR MOBILE LIKE '%${users}%' OR QQ_NICKNAME LIKE '%${users}%' OR WX_NICKNAME LIKE '%${users}%'

select
from SUC_USER
and ID in (${ids})
and (LOGIN_NAME LIKE '%${keys}%' OR NICKNAME LIKE '%${keys}%' OR REALNAME LIKE '%${keys}%' OR IDCARD LIKE '%${keys}%' OR EMAIL LIKE '%${keys}%' OR MOBILE LIKE '%${keys}%' OR QQ_NICKNAME LIKE '%${keys}%' OR WX_NICKNAME LIKE '%${keys}%' OR ID LIKE '%${keys}%')

select
from SUC_USER
and domain_id in ('${domainId}')
and (LOGIN_NAME LIKE '%${keys}%' OR NICKNAME LIKE '%${keys}%' OR REALNAME LIKE '%${keys}%' OR IDCARD LIKE '%${keys}%' OR EMAIL LIKE '%${keys}%' OR MOBILE LIKE '%${keys}%' OR QQ_NICKNAME LIKE '%${keys}%' OR WX_NICKNAME LIKE '%${keys}%' OR ID LIKE '%${keys}%')

SELECT su.*, so.`NAME` FROM SUC_USER su LEFT JOIN SUC_ORG so ON su.ORG_ID=so.ID
and su.LOGIN_NAME LIKE '%${users}%' OR su.NICKNAME LIKE '%${users}%' OR su.REALNAME LIKE '%${users}%' OR su.IDCARD LIKE '%${users}%' OR su.EMAIL LIKE '%${users}%' OR su.MOBILE LIKE '%${users}%' OR su.QQ_NICKNAME LIKE '%${users}%' OR su.WX_NICKNAME LIKE '%${users}%' OR su.ID LIKE '%${users}%'
